recipes.name: Chicken Soup
recipes.description: Chicken soup with hint of lemon

recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: Heat up the oil in pan, add in onion and carrots, fry in mild heat for 10 mins. Add water, broth cube, bay leaf, lemon peel and thyme. Boil 30 mins.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: Add potatoes and chicken to the soup, boil 15 mins.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and pepper and if wanted with french cream

recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: Sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg and melted butted and mix.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: Fry in a pancake pan. Enjoy!
